Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ScenarioInstanceId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="ParentGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="BlockerNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BlockerName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="BlockerNameLength"/> <data name="BlockerGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ActiveTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>
